meanings.sent1: The magician becharms the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful melody becharms everyone who listens.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy becharms the children with its antics.
meanings.sent4: Her smile becharms him like a spell he cannot resist.
meanings.sent5: The sunset becharms the sky with its vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To cast a spell on someone
meanings.sent1: The witch becharms her enemies to protect herself.
meanings.sent2: The fairy becharms the forest to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome becharms the garden with tiny enchantments.
meanings.sent4: The wizard becharms the potion to make it powerful.
meanings.sent5: The enchantress becharms the night with her mystical aura.
